channel.title: CVE Feed for Eyal Fitoussi -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Eyal Fitoussi -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-47327|2024-10-07T13:11:57.177Z -- eyal%20fitoussi -- geo%20my%20wordpress
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Eyal Fitoussi GEO my WordPress allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects GEO my WordPress: from n/a through 4.5.0.3.
